product_name: Leki Carbide Universal Flex Tips - Pair
long_description: These tough, shock-absorbing tips fit on Leki(R) trekking poles; they flex up to 30 degrees, preventing damage to the pole shaft. Carbide steel point imbedded in the Flex Tip provides a secure hold on ice and rock. Easy to install; requires no tools.
short_description: These tough, shock-absorbing tips fit on Leki(R) trekking poles; they flex up to 30 degrees, preventing damage to the pole shaft.
